item.title: OCN in Digital Fabrication @ FabLab
item.description:
Friday, January 25, 2013 - 10:25

FabLab Belfast | Nerve Centre are now offering OCN Level 1 accrediation to groups interested in using FabLab.

Open College Network Northern Ireland working with the Nerve Centre has developed an accredited course – Using Digital Fabrication Systems, which allows learners to gain recognition for the  engineering and technical skills they gain through using FabLab.

“OCNNI is delighted to be working with the Nerve Centre and the Ashton Centre to provide recognition for the engineering and technical skills learners are gaining through the FabLab” – Sean McCormick, Business and Enterprise Manager, OCNNI.

This opportuinity enables participants to gain a recognised qualification while learing about the revolutionary world of digital fabrication.

For more information please contact your nearest lab; Belfast or Nerve Centre.

OCN
